name: jsoi
description: A minimalistic, zero dependency javascript library that can perform string interpolation recursively over javascript objects preserving types. Great for dynamic configuration loading, supports asynchronous loading of objects with user defined callbacks in NodeJS or in a browser.
author: Kevin McGraw

scripts.copy_supporting_docs: npm run copy_license && npm run copy_readme && npm run copy_icons && npm run copy_html
scripts.deploy_all: npm run push_tags && npm run cpy_dist_package && npm run version_dist_package && npm run pack_dist && npm run rename_pkg_to_latest && npm run deploy_gh_pages
scripts.build: npm run clean_dist && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build_dist && npm run copy_supporting_docs
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run deploy_all
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run deploy_all
scripts.deploy:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run deploy_all
